knimeNode.name: Mask Date/Time
knimeNode.shortDescription: Masks (removes) date or time fields from existing date/time.

fullDescription.intro: Masks (removes) date or time or milliseconds from existing date/time, where this information is available.
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing date/time that should be masked.
Select if the date fields (year, month, day) should be masked.
Select if the time fields (hour, minute, second and millisecond) should be masked.
Select if only the milliseconds should be masked.
